Articles.Content:
Useful as it is there seems to be one thing lacking--once I'm in space I seem to lack the ability to select a target and enter a specified orbit about it--I have to do a bunch of maneuver planning rather than just one command--and I've had the maneuvers go very wonky at times.

It does such a nice job of most things and falls down badly when going from one moon to another.

Am I missing something??
